about_the_game:
We've brought to life the game from those frequently seen ad videos! Enemy forces are invading territories. Build defense systems, launch offensives, and reclaim sovereignty! It'll immerse you in a sci - fi future war world. As a central control room commander, embark on a grand defense campaign. Combine firepower and defense units to retake controlled areas.

Amidst intense firepower, defend your territory in this highly - freedom strategy game. Construct an economic system and freely build various functional units. While fending off enemies, seize new areas.

The unit + entry system adds more possibilities. You can freely acquire and manage different units, adding entries with various attributes and functions, sparking different combinations in campaigns.

TechGuardian: Territory Defense offers multiple game modes, including single - player and endless modes.

In single - player mode, you'll enter various campaigns and maps. While defending your territory, launch counter - attacks and reclaim occupied areas. This mode lets you either immerse in resisting the overwhelming enemies or quickly complete occupation tasks to end campaigns.

Endless mode provides a battleground for non - stop fighting, allowing you to deploy defenses in advance against endless foes. Once the battle starts, it won't stop until failure.

Game features:

  • Sci - fi visual tower defense combat, defending territories and reclaiming enemy - controlled areas;

  • Real - time strategy gameplay, complete economic system, build units to enhance firepower coverage;

  • Over 30 + units with different functions, units have different levels, freely edit various - purpose entries to gain creative abilities;

  • Various powerful enemies, flying in the sky and running on the ground;

  • Supports endless mode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a sci - fi themed tower defense game. Players defend their territory by building defense towers and reclaim areas controlled by enemies. The game adds over 30 different units, all of which can be upgraded to achieve higher performance and firepower through editing entries.
